A4.text: Freema Agyeman... role as the Doctor's companion Martha Jones in the BBC science fiction series Doctor Who (2007â€“2010)

A5.text: Following extensive speculation on who would replace Billie Piper, Agyeman was confirmed to the press as new companion Martha Jones on 5 July 2006.
